Package cz.cvut.fel.nutforms.rules.metamodel.condition

Deprecated.
This hierarchy is no longer used, as the parsing of logical expressions of conditions was moved to client side. String representation of the logical expression is used instead.
Class hierarchy for individual Drools rule condition distinction.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Condition
    Abstract implementation of one condition of a business rule.
    Eval
    Custom implementation of EvalCondition condition.
    Group
    Implementation of logical operators "||", "&&" and ","
    Pattern
    Custom implementation of Pattern condition.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Group.Operator  

Package cz.cvut.fel.nutforms.rules.metamodel.condition Description
